item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“pokemonn, post:3, topic:380445”]Yea I’m positive lol and um David the login.java does not change at all yes I do compile and yes I changed the greeting message also correctly[/quote]If none of the changes you are making are going into effect, and you are restarting the server correctly, it means that it isn’t making the changes (because it didn’t compile)

If you changed the folder names, that might cause a problem.

item.title: 508 xp rate

item.description:
@pokemonn wrote:

Hi i changed the xp rate on my davidscape508 but it didnt seem to register with server or something yes i did compile an yes i restarted server is there anyone that can help me out ill show proof tht i changed it:

here is proof

[code]package DavidScape.players.combat;

import DavidScape.Engine;
import DavidScape.players.Player;
import DavidScape.players.items.PlayerWeapon;
import DavidScape.util.Misc;
import DavidScape.npcs.NPC;
import DavidScape.players.combat.*;

public class PlayerNPCCombat {
public int CombatXPRate = 1000;
public int RangeDamage = 0;
public void GiveRangeXP(Player p) {
p.addSkillXP((500 * RangeDamage * CombatXPRate)/3 ,3);
}
public int maxRangeHit(Player p) {
int a = p.skillLvl[4];
int b = p.equipmentBonus[4];
double c = (double)a;
double d = (double)b;
double f = 0;
double h = 0;
f = (d0.00175)+0.1;
h = Math.floor(cf+2.05);

	return (int) h;[/code]
